name: Be Descriptive
description:
Dashboards can be even more useful when you know what their purpose is. If the author isn't too lazy, they can provide some sort of description for their creation! 

![dashboard_fever](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQD5SEulkFry3y8zX3AcB6mhqXQAkjqBTnYtive043ZnMUO0-bVKbDgvZoA158OClzIMfk&usqp=CAU)
